info.description:
====================================
Account Create Cash Basis Entry Hook
====================================

.. !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
   !! This file is generated by oca-gen-addon-readme !!
   !! changes will be overwritten.                   !!
   !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

.. |badge1| image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/maturity-Beta-yellow.png
    :target: https://odoo-community.org/page/development-status
    :alt: Beta
.. |badge2| image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/licence-AGPL--3-blue.png
    :target: http://www.gnu.org/licenses/agpl-3.0-standalone.html
    :alt: License: AGPL-3
.. |badge3| image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/github-OCA%2Fl10n--thailand-lightgray.png?logo=github
    :target: https://github.com/OCA/l10n-thailand/tree/12.0/account_create_tax_cash_basis_entry_hook
    :alt: OCA/l10n-thailand
.. |badge4| image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/weblate-Translate%20me-F47D42.png
    :target: https://translation.odoo-community.org/projects/l10n-thailand-12-0/l10n-thailand-12-0-account_create_tax_cash_basis_entry_hook
    :alt: Translate me on Weblate
.. |badge5| image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/runbot-Try%20me-875A7B.png
    :target: https://runbot.odoo-community.org/runbot/238/12.0
    :alt: Try me on Runbot

|badge1| |badge2| |badge3| |badge4| |badge5| 

This module adds hook points in account_partial_reconcile.create_tax_cash_basis_entry()
in order to allow sending more context information into creating move line for cash basis

Although the original code has been modified a bit, the logic has been respected and
the method still does exactly the same

**Table of contents**

.. contents::
   :local:

Usage
=====

1. Add dependency of this module
2. Inherit from 'account.partial.reconcile'
3. Change the _set_additional_context function in order to add more information for cash basis move line creation
